thread.title: Kathleen
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Kathleen

author: Kathleen
title: Kathleen
text:
I really do not like shopping for insurance but agent Anthony really made it a very hassle free experience which was a pleasant surprise. He presented me with options and then explained them so that I understood exactly what I was getting.
Bottom line is he saved me a lot of money, was very helpful and knowledgeable.
